You http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_55_pts_Playoff_Career_High_vs_NO_Hornets_2003 Philadelphia 98, New Orleans 90 Allen Iverson 's 55 Gives Sixers Game 1 In the illustious history of the Philadelphia 76ers, nobody-- not Wilt, not Julius Erving , not Moses-- had an individual performance like Allen Iverson 's against the New Orleans Hornets. Allen Iverson scored a team playoff-record 55 points as the 76ers defeated the Hornets, 98-90, in Game One of their Eastern Conference first-round series.`` He was on fire, Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston.`` Anytime a guy like that is on fire,

friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added. So he suggests that Mike Pence may be planning to announce only that he is not running for president, and withhold a formal declaration on running for governor until later. I don't think you're going to see a big press conference, said Ogle.`` When he does do it, I just think it will be a release that I have decided what I am NOT going to do, not what I am going to do.''
